extensionDescription.message: Blocks specific sites from appearing in Google search results

dayjsLocale.description: The locale for 'dayjs'. See https://github.com/iamkun/dayjs/tree/dev/src/locale and select a proper locale.

error.description: The text that means an error occurred.

cancelButton.description: The text of a cancel button.

okButton.description: The text of an OK button.

content_singleSiteBlocked.description: The text that means one site has been blocked.

content_multipleSitesBlocked.description: The text that means multiple site have been blocked.

content_showBlockedSitesLink.description: The text of the link to show blocked sites.

content_hideBlockedSitesLink.description: The text of the link to hide blocked sites.

content_blockSiteLink.description: The text of a link to block a site.

content_unblockSiteLink.description: The text of a link to unblock a site.

popup_blockSiteTitle.description: The title of a popup to block a site.

popup_unblockSiteTitle.description: The title of a popup to unblock a site.

popup_details.description: The title of the disclosure widget that contains the details.

popup_pageURLLabel.description: The label for the input that shows a page URL.

popup_pathDepth.description: The label for the input that shows a path depth of rules to be added.

popup_addedRulesLabel.description: The label for the textarea that shows rules to be added.

popup_removedRulesLabel.description: The label for the textarea that shows rules to be removed.

popup_blockSiteButton.description: The text of the button to block a site.

popup_unblockSiteButton.description: The text of the button to unblock a site.

popup_siteBlockedBySubscription.description: The text that means a site is blocked by a subscription.

options_generalTitle.description: The title of the general section.

options_blacklistLabel.message: Sites blocked from appearing in Google search results
options_blacklistLabel.description: The label for the blacklist textarea.

options_blacklistHelper.message: You can use match patterns or regular expressions.
options_blacklistHelper.description: The helper text for the blacklist textarea.

options_importBlacklistButton.description: The text of the button to import a blacklist from Personal Blocklist.

options_saveBlacklistButton.description: The text of the button to save a blacklist.

options_importBlacklistDialog_title.description: The title of the import-blacklist dialog.

options_importBlacklistDialog_helper.message: Paste a domain list exported from Personal Blocklist.
options_importBlacklistDialog_helper.description: The helper text for the textarea on the import-blacklist dialog.

options_importBlacklistDialog_importButt.description: The text of the import button on the import-blacklist dialog.

options_otherSearchEnginesDescription.message: You can use this extension on the below search engines.
options_otherSearchEnginesDescription.description: The details for other search engines support.

options_enableOnSearchEngine.description: The text of the button to enable this extension on a search engine.

options_enabledOnSearchEngine.description: The text of the button to indicate that this extension is enabled on a search engine.

options_hideBlockSiteLinksLabel.description: The label for the switch whether to hide the 'Block this site' links.

options_hideControl.message: Hide the number of blocked sites and the 'Show' link
options_hideControl.description: The label for the switch whether to hide the number of blocked sites and the 'Show' link.

options_syncTitle.description: The title of the sync section.

options_syncFeatureDescription.message: If you turn on sync, a file named 'uBlacklist.txt' will be created on your Google Drive and synchronized with your blacklist.
options_syncFeatureDescription.description: The description of the sync feature.

options_turnOnSync.description: The text of the button to turn on sync.

options_syncTurnedOn.description: The text that means sync is turned on.

options_turnOffSync.description: The text of the button to turn off sync.

options_syncResult.description: The text that means the result of the last sync.

options_syncNever.description: The text that means sync has been never performed.

options_syncRunning.description: The text that means sync is running right now.

options_syncNowButton.description: The text of the button to sync now.

options_subscriptionTitle.description: The title of the subscription section.

options_subscriptionFeatureDescription.message: If you add a subscription, a blacklist will be regularly downloaded from the specified URL.
options_subscriptionFeatureDescription.description: The description of the subscription feature.

options_addSubscriptionButton.description: The text of the button to add a subscription.

options_subscriptionNameHeader.description: The header text of the name row of the subscriptions table.

options_subscriptionURLHeader.description: The header text of the URL row of the subscriptions table.

options_subscriptionUpdateResultHeader.description: The header text of the update-result row of the subscriptions table.

options_noSubscriptionsAdded.description: The text that means no subscriptions have been added.

options_subscriptionUpdateRunning.description: The text that means update is running right now.

options_showSubscriptionMenu.description: The text of a menu item to show a subscription.

options_updateSubscriptionNowMenu.description: The text of a menu item to update a subscription now.

options_removeSubscriptionMenu.description: The text of a menu item to remove a subscription.

options_updateAllSubscriptionsNowButton.description: The text of the button to update all subscriptions now.

options_addSubscriptionDialog_title.description: The title of the add-subscription dialog.

options_addSubscriptionDialog_nameLabel.description: The label for the name input on the add-subscription dialog.

options_addSubscriptionDialog_urlLabel.description: The label for the URL input on the add-subscription dialog.

options_addSubscriptionDialog_addButton.description: The text of the add button on the add-subscription dialog.
